text:
If task that has a failonerror/haltonerror
attribute fails to generate a certain XML file,
I want the style task that would normally
transform the generated file not to break
the build due to an invalid XML.
creator: stein@xtramind.com

text:
I suggest looking at trycatch in ant-contrib.

http://ant-contrib.sourceforge.net/tasks/trycatch.html

Recommend for closing bug.
